headline: Apple Explores Generative AI to Accelerate Custom Chip Design, Senior VP Reveals
summary: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the best QQQ stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On June 18, Reuters reported that Apple’s Senior Vice President of Hardware Technologies, Johny Srouji, presented a speech at the ITF World Conference in Belgium last month, where he mentioned that Apple is exploring the use of GenAI to […]
